page.title: 03LIFE STYLES CLUBS IN BREDGAR
page.content: In Bredgar there are many clubs in which villagers participate.The annual fete provides funds for several of them.There is the Bredgar singers group;some people from the village who sing religious and folk songs.They rehearse in the school hall and are asked to sing at weddings and other functions,they give concerts to raise money for the church tower fund. The Darby and Joan club meets regularly in the village hall to play Whist, hear talks etc and goes on several trips yearly.The Women's Institute has about forty members and is linked whith the National Federation.There is a cricket club that plays on the recreation ground.
